info.name: banking-app
info.description: Golang API for a banking application. It describes create/view a customer, open a bank account for a customer, withdraw money from bank account, deposit money to bank account, view balance for any account, view all the fixed accounts for a customer etc.

request.description: Create cutomer successfully for the given paylod.
Throw error if required fields are missing from the payload.

response.name: Create customer error - validation

request.description: Get all the customers created in database.
Get customer by customer_id passed in path variable.

item.name: Accounts - Common

request.description: Create an account successfully for the given payload.

item.name: Create account error - customer does not exist

request.description: Throw an error if customer does not exist in database while creating bank account for the customer.

response.name: Create account error - customer does not exist

item.name: Create account error - missing required fields

request.description: Throw an error if missing required fields while creating bank account.

response.name: Create account error - missing required fields

request.description: Deposit money into the account passed in path variable and display the balance in response along with customer id and account id.
Withdraw from the account passed in path variable and display the balance in response.
Withdraw from the account passed in path variable and display the balance in response.
Get all the accounts in the database.
Get account details for the account id passed in path variable.
Get all accounts for a customer. A customer can have more than one FD account.

response.name: Get all accounts for customer
response.body:
{
    "statusCode": 200,
    "timeElapsed": 16,
    "hasErrorResponse": false,
    "bank_accounts": [
        {
            "customer_id": 234,
            "account_id": 51691853,
            "account_type": "SAVINGS",
            "balance": 20000,
            "created_at": "2022-12-20T10:26:59Z",
            "updated_at": "2022-12-20T10:26:59Z",
            "is_active": true
        },
        {
            "customer_id": 234,
            "account_id": 51691856,
            "account_type": "FIXED",
            "balance": 20000,
            "created_at": "2022-12-20T10:34:35Z",
            "updated_at": "2022-12-20T10:34:35Z",
            "lock_period_fd": 2,
            "is_locked": true,
            "is_active": true,
            "penalty_fd": 0.1,
            "locked_until": "2024-12-20T15:34:36Z"
        },
        {
            "customer_id": 234,
            "account_id": 51691857,
            "account_type": "FIXED",
            "balance": 100000,
            "created_at": "2022-12-20T10:32:23Z",
            "updated_at": "2022-12-20T10:32:23Z",
            "lock_period_fd": 1,
            "is_locked": true,
            "is_active": true,
            "penalty_fd": 0.1,
            "locked_until": "2023-12-20T15:32:23Z"
        }
    ]
}

item.description: APIs for managing bank accounts for different customers.

item.name: Accounts - Savings
Deposit into savings account more than 50K

request.description: Throw error if pan number not provided while depositing more than 50K in savings account.

response.name: Deposit into savings account more than 50K
Deposit into savings account more than 50K

item.description: APIs for scenarios specific to saving accounts.

item.name: Accounts - Current

response.name: Err: Deposit in CURRENT Account
Err: Withdraw from CURRENT Account

item.description: APIs for scenarios specific to saving accounts.

request.description: Throw error if locking period was not provided while creating a fixed account.

response.name: Create FIXED account error

request.description: Create a fixed account successfully for the given valid payload.
Throw error if deposing into fixed account after account was created. Deposit in FD can be done only once while creating the account.

response.name: Deposit into fixed account

request.description: Throw error if deposing into fixed account after account was created. Deposit in FD can be done only once while creating the account.

response.name: Err: Withdraw from fixed account

request.description: Throw error if deposing into fixed account after account was created. Deposit in FD can be done only once while creating the account.

response.name: Err2: Withdraw from fixed account
